text:
Hey there again,
Where can I  apply for the HubSpot CMS private beta.
You can get a developer account if that is what you asking for?
is it possible to buy an inbound ticket later as well?  for those who realize that they should have watched certain sessions :wink:... ?
yes
its 119
usd
i know but can i only buy that now or will i be able to buy it in 2 weeks as well?
oh no clue
is it possible to set default content on a repeater module?
I have a client asking for that - but wasn't sure how to accomplish it...
I believe you can only set the single default, but not for a specific repeater item

Sorry for posting here but there does not seem to be a channel for _Web Analytics integration_.

I would like to make certain HubSpot Contact properties available in Google Analytics for segmentation (non PII) such as:
- Lifecycle Stage
- Associated Company
- Lead Status
- Create date
- FocusSegment
- Sales Region
- Persona

Is there a resource available on how to do that? Iâ€™m using Google Tag Manager so a way to get these properties into the DataLayer object is great

Hello! Could anyone suggest a solution (or point me to some resources) for team collaboration = 2-3 developers working on the HubSpot website (ideally with code versioning)? I wish to develop a website with at least another person.
maybe jira?
in combination with Github: <https://marketplace.atlassian.com/apps/1219592/github-for-jira?hosting=cloud&tab=overview>
but does it connect with Desing Manager or sth?

Hey <@UMVR6LVLK> we have a tutorial on using Github for versioning with Github actions: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/github-integration>

This may help with what you are looking to do
wow! Great! thank you!

Additionally <@UMVR6LVLK>  I recommend checking out <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/creating-an-efficient-development-workflow|Creating an efficient development workflow> as it  has insights around building as a team
Also looking for this feature! Added my upvote :blush:
Yes. Add that while creating module and whenever client add new item it will populate with content added while creating module
